original_title: inSocialWork - The Podcast Series of the University at Buffalo School of Social Work
overview: inSocialWork is the podcast series of the University at Buffalo School of Social Work. The purpose of this series is to engage practitioners and researchers in lifelong learning and to promote research to practice, practice to research. inSocialWork features conversations with prominent social work professionals, interviews with cutting-edge researchers, and information on emerging trends and best practices in the field of social work.
title: inSocialWork - The Podcast Series of the University at Buffalo School of Social Work
